title: The Bank of England: everything you wanted to know
itunes:title: The Bank of England: everything you wanted to know
itunes:subtitle: As the Bank of England continues to hit the headlines in the UK, Professor Anne Murphy guides us through the 300-year history of one of Britain’s most important institutions
description:
Why was the Bank of England created? Did it power the Industrial Revolution? And when did it become known as the “Old Lady”? As the Bank continues to hit the headlines in the UK, Professor Anne Murphy guides us through the 300-year history of one of Britain’s most important institutions.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
